insert-row.description: Insert a row into a table.

props.name: sqlTexts
props.description: Array of SQL queries to execute in order, in the same transaction. Use :1, :2… placeholders to use binding parameters.

props.name: binds
props.description: Binding parameters shared across all queries to prevent SQL injection attacks.

props.name: useTransaction
props.description: When enabled, all queries will be executed in a single transaction. If any query fails, all changes will be rolled back.

props.name: timeout
props.description: An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a query to complete before timing out.

props.name: application
props.description: A string indicating the name of the client application connecting to the server.
